description: Listed Building Consent application in connection with alterations to existing shopfront including new signage, repainting and internal alterations to include new change area, cash desk, relining wall and relocating access steps (planning application ref: P070216 and Advertisement Consent application ref: P070215 also submitted)
site_name: Basement And Ground Floor Front Right
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Detailed drawings at a scale of not less than 1:20 of the (1) colour and type of roller shutters 
(2) roller shutter housing proposed and how it is to be fixed to the original fabric of the building, 
shall be submitted and approved by the Local Planning Authority before this portion of the work is commenced.

REASON: In order to safeguard the special architectural and historic interest of this building included in the Statutory List.
